IC;MediaTek;MT6392A;;1; ,,, USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Realtek;RTS5482;;1; ,,, 5V 1.7A, Precision Adjustable Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2553;15JL;1; |802dot11_protocols = none |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B07HHVF2XG |asin_country = |asin2 = B07HHJQ1D5 |asin_country2 = IT |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *'''PlayStation Classic''' :Model No. SCPH-1000R :''Sony Interactive Intertainment Inc.'' ===Specifications=== *[https://playstationdev.wiki/psclassicdevwiki/index.php?title=PlayStation_Classic ''Sony PlayStation Classic'' on '''PSDevWiki'''] (PCB images) *[https://games.hdblog.it/2018/11/27/recensione-sony-playstation-classic/ ''Sony PlayStation Classic'' Review on '''HDblog'''] ([https://hd.tudocdn.net/807066?w=5000 PCB] images) :*SoC: [[MediaTek]] [https://www.MediaTek.com/products/tablets/mt8167a MT8167A] @1.5GHz (Quad Core ARM Cortex-A35) :*Flash: [[Samsung]] [https://www.samsung.com/semiconductor/estorage/emmc/KLMAG1JETD-B041/ KLMAG1JETD-B041] (16GB eMMC 5.1) :*RAM: 2x [[Samsung]] [https://www.samsung.com/semiconductor/dram/ddr3/K4B4G1646E-BYMA/ K4B4G1646E-BYMA] (1GB DDR3-1866) :*GPU: [https://www.imgtec.com/powervr-gpu/ge8300/ PowerVR GE8300]; PMIC: [[MediaTek]] MT6392A :*USB 2.0: [[Realtek]] [http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/entry/2018/12/13/020403 RTS5482] ([http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/entry/2018/12/13/094124 USB 2.0 Hub] Controller) ::Power-Distribution Switch: [[TI]] [http://www.ti.com.cn/product/cn/TPS2553 TPS2553] ([http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/entry/2018/12/15/234711 15JL]) 5V/1.7A :*Ports: 1x HDMI, 2x USB 2.0 (Controllers), 1x micro USB (PSU) :*Resolutions support: 720p, 480p (via HDMI) :*Motherboard: Sony LM-11 (1-984-020-11) :*Emulator: ''PCSX ReARMed'' :*Power: DC 5V/1A (micro USB) :*Dimensions: 149 x 33 x 105 mm :*Weight: 170 g ==Links of Interest== ===Teardown=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/11/28/sony-playstation-classic-teardown-MediaTek-mt8167a-processor/ ''Sony PlayStation Classic'' Teardown on '''CNX-Software'''] (PCB images) *[https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/digitalfoundry-2018-playstation-mini-teardown ''Sony PlayStation Classic'' Teardown on '''EuroGamer'''] ([https://d2skuhm0vrry40.cloudfront.net/2018/articles/2018-11-27-20-21/7.JPG PCB] images) *[https://pc.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/topic/review/1156344.html ''Sony PlayStation Classic'' Teardown on '''PC|Watch'''] (PCB images) :''Sony PlayStation 1 (SCPH-5500)'' Teardown (JP) • [http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/archive '''HoneyLab'''] (JP) *[https://m.mobile01.com/topicdetail.php?f=281&t=5652044&p=1 ''Sony PlayStation Classic'' Teardown on '''Mobile01'''] ([https://attach.mobile01.com/attach/201812/mobile01-2e35f1c3d0c36f6f9e66c19d28c394c2.jpg PCB] images) ===Mods=== *[https://github.com/pathartl/BleemSync ''Add custom games on USB Storage safely with BleemSync'' on '''GitHub'''] *[http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/entry/2018/12/13/094124 ''Add 3rd USB port on PlayStation Classic (SCPH-1000R)'' on '''HoneyLab'''] *[http://honeylab.hatenablog.jp/entry/2018/12/17/152608 ''PlayStation Classic Online (USB-Ethernet and USB-WiFi)'' on '''HoneyLab'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info==
